Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Usually, I upload the assignment rubric and my paper and ask GenAI what improvements I could make. But it always grades me higher than an actual teacher would. So I always ask it to be as critical as possible.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI feedback was a lot more lenient and lured me into a false sense of security about the quality of my work, compared to the teachers feedback.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI feedback is very vague, and I feel it tells me what I want to hear.
